sub_title: Global Security Program Manager, Corporate Security, Shell Plc
summary:
An officer recruited through the Civil Services examination in 1992, having worked with the Central Industrial Security Force (CISF) for over 20 years, I have experience and exposure  in providing composite security solutions to large vital establishments including ports, airports, public sector units and other sensitive installations.I have worked  extensively in the field of integrated security management,  human resource management, administration, training, security consulting, internal security, labor relations and quasi judicial arbitration in gender issues. 
I have also worked as a United Nations Civilian Police Officer In Kosovo in the year 2005-06, where I handled media liaison and was deputy chief of operations in the Border and Boundary HQs, in Pristina.
I have taken voluntary retirement from the CISF after 20 years  in Service.
After retirement I have been a consultant with PROCAM INTERNATIONAL as Event Head -Security for the World 10k Bangalore Marathon and Airtel Delhi Half Marathon.
I worked in CAIRN INDIA LTD from Jan 2014 at their Corporate Office as DGM/Security- Process, Audit, Training. and Intelligence till April 2016. 
Thereafter a made a lateral move as DGM CSR from May 2016 to February 2017, where I managed and headed programs in health, education, Livelihoods and Skills.
From 2017 to 2022 I was the Country Security Manager for Shell India and responsible for Security risk management and advisory in the countries in India, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka. 
In 2023 I moved to a global role within Corporate Security in Shell International BV as Global Security Program Manager where I am responsible to implement and roll out the Shell Integrated Security Platform in all Shell Upstream, Midstream & Downstream sites across all geographies. I am the product owner of Deployment of Enterprise Security Solutions and work in the field of digitization and simplification of all security systems & security data.

profile_positions.description:
Responsible to build, operate & maintain all corporate security programs including Deployment of Enterprise Security (DESS) across sites located in all countries. 
I am the product owner for all enterprise security solutions in all Shell sites across geographies and the main remit is to work towards building a Shell Integrated Security Platform, integrating 160 sites into a simplified & fully digitized security platform.

profile_positions.description:
Plan, prepare and implement Security Strategy which included fresh risk assessments of all sites, standardization of all security management systems, procedures and processes, management and up gradation of security infrastructure including PIDS, inclusion of security risk as a part of Cairn Business Risk Management System, setting up an intelligence structure, starting the process of bench marking of best practices of security in oil and gas industry, audit of manpower,security management systems and technology and closing working with CSR to improve the first responder mechanism to community issues.
As a part of standardization and streamlining of management systems, secured ISO 9000:2008 certification for the security management system of the  Cairn O&G pipeline, a first in the O&G industry in the country. 
In the field of training, my responsibilities include preparing Training Need Analysis (TNA) for all security managers, devise training philosophy and strategy, conduct of training sessions and works shops. Currently I also look after the training needs of the Safety Department in addition to Security
